category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEGANTTElementHeight
preference.preference_description: Specifies the height of one element of the Gantt chart in the navigation and the representation area (the amount of pixels that are used for one element). There is no space between the elements (10 elements use 10 times the space of one element). Valid Values: Positive integers.
